properties.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued March 1 at 7:01AM PST until March 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Lake Mead in
particular.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves could result in
dangerous boating conditions on Lake Mead Sunday morning.
These winds will create very choppy waters and generate large
waves, which could capsize or swamp small craft. If you do
venture out onto the lakes, avoid the open water and stay
close to shore or in protected coves and inlets.
properties.instruction:
Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds
and rough waves can overturn small craft.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON
